body.p: “There is a rough ridge “,” confined to the bark only and about a quarter of an inch high “,”” extending from the crotch diagonally down the tree “,” apparently to a point over the true centre of growth.”
PE 10, pg. 147 / 4 January-23 April 1856 / NNPM MA 1302:26 / T vol. # XX / PDF # XIV / JVIII
